fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 24.10 points or 0.12% to settle at 19,355.90. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 0.60% to 11.46. Reliance Industries, HDFC Bank and Tata Motors were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The July 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 July 2023.
